assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: As per the protocol at William Paterson University, the Institutional Review Board does not review studies that do not involve human subjects. This article does not contain any studies with human or animal subjects performed by the any of the authors.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare no competing interests.
